mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board (title, ctnt, iuser) VALUES (#{title}, #{ctnt}, #{iuser})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_board WHERE iboard = #{iboard} AND iuser = #{iuser}
mapper.select: SELECT A.iboard, A.title, A.regdt, B.unm as writerNm, B.profileImg, B.iuser FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser ORDER BY A.iboard DESC
SELECT A.iuser, A.iboard, A.title, A.regdt, A.ctnt, B.unm as writerNm, B.profileImg FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE A.iboard = #{iboard}
